Package org.pipservices4.container.refer

Class RunReferencesDecorator

java.lang.Object
org.pipservices4.container.refer.ReferencesDecorator
org.pipservices4.container.refer.RunReferencesDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.pipservices4.components.refer.IReferences, org.pipservices4.components.run.IClosable, org.pipservices4.components.run.IOpenable
public class RunReferencesDecorator extends ReferencesDecorator implements org.pipservices4.components.run.IOpenable
References decorator that automatically opens to newly added components that implement IOpenable interface and closes removed components that implement IClosable interface.

    • remove

      public Object remove(Object locator) throws org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException
      Removes a previously added reference that matches specified locator. If many references match the locator, it removes only the first one. When all references shall be removed, use removeAll() method instead.
      Specified by:
      remove in interface org.pipservices4.components.refer.IReferences
      Overrides:
      remove in class ReferencesDecorator
      Parameters:
      locator - a locator to remove reference
      Returns:
      the removed component reference.
      Throws:
      org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException - when error occured.
      See Also:
      • removeAll(Object)

    • removeAll

      public List<Object> removeAll(Object locator) throws org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException
      Removes all component references that match the specified locator.
      Specified by:
      removeAll in interface org.pipservices4.components.refer.IReferences
      Overrides:
      removeAll in class ReferencesDecorator
      Parameters:
